body:
Heyo. Title speaks for itself, so ask away. ;)

Opinions will be honest. :)
body_tagged:
Heyo. Title speaks for itself, so ask away. ;)

Opinions will be honest. :)
title: AMA, bored

replies.body: Pretty good. Exams are over and about to break up for holidays but laptop went into kamikaze mode so no more games for me for a while. Should set up a charity for a new one. :'(
replies.body_tagged: Pretty good. Exams are over and about to break up for holidays but laptop went into kamikaze mode so no more games for me for a while. Should set up a charity for a new one. :'(

replies.body:
o/
Opinions? (mep)
What do you love most about the United Kingdom?
How many sports do you play?
replies.body_tagged:
o/
Opinions? (mep)
What do you love most about the United Kingdom?
How many sports do you play?

replies.body:
Opinions?
What is your favorite country (besides your home country)?
What is your favorite food
replies.body_tagged:
Opinions?
What is your favorite country (besides your home country)?
What is your favorite food

replies.body:
Tazz

Opinion

Never really liked you. First time I met you I didn't really know who you were. When I joined the staff team, I really began to dislike you. You came off as arrogant, bitchy and fairly bratty (yes, I know the first one is pretty much kettle calling the pot black). You also seemed to have an extreme superiority complex, where once you knew how to do something no one else could possibly know how to either. 

Rockyyyyy

Opinions?

Awesome guy, pretty good at PvP. First met you on Nexus and you were really friendly. Hoping you get a chance at mod. ;)

KojaSprite

Opinions

One of my favourite people who I know still play the server. You're approachable and kind but also know where to draw the line. Glad you got mod. You were one of the people I was betting on during the trials. 

DaFrozenBlaze

Why are you bored?

Laptop decided that it was a good time to break down. Have to wait while the drive is repaired or faili that the hard drive is salvaged. So yeah, BORED.

Siera_

Opinions? (mep)

Another of my favourite people who still plays on the server. Thanks for letting me join Home, I still have the skin you made. xD 

What do you love most about the United Kingdom?

Our ability to screw up even the simplest things. EU referendum? Let's vote for Brexit! General election? Let's vote in wobbly May! It's like being in a real life sitcom.

How many sports do you play?

Seriously? Just swimming. For fun? Swimming and badminton.


mels159

Opinions?

Nice guy, loved our games of KOTH. You leaving was one of the reasons for me saying goodbye. 

What is your favourite coury (besides your home country)?

Toss-up between France and Belgium. The UK is nowhere near my favourite. xD

What is your favourite food

PIZZA!

replies.body: havent spoken to you for agess, how are you?!
replies.body_tagged: havent spoken to you for agess, how are you?!

replies.body:
Opinions?
Opinions on South Korea and Greece?
Favorite song genre?
Favorite food?
Do you still love cheese puffs?
replies.body_tagged:
Opinions?
Opinions on South Korea and Greece?
Favorite song genre?
Favorite food?
Do you still love cheese puffs?

replies.body:
Hey myworld, good to hear you're still posing on the Forums! Long time no speak...

Opinions?
replies.body_tagged:
Hey myworld, good to hear you're still posing on the Forums! Long time no speak...

Opinions?

replies.body:
Junr 
Opinions? Really nice guy and a damn good mod but can be a bit immature from time to time. Haven't talked to you for a while and you broke the streak :'(.

Mehrp
havent spoken to you for agess, how are you?! Hey! It's been way too long. X)

I'm pretty good, happy exams are over. How are you??! :)

YourGirlAthena
Opinions? I'll be honest; I didn't trust you at first. You seemed way too nice to be believed. However, since I've spoken to you more I'm sorry for thinking that of you. You're one of the nicest people on here. :)

Opinions on South Korea and Greece? I like South Korea because they taunt North Korea. I've always wanted to go to Greece, so much I want to see. Pls buy me a ticket. :'( :P

Favorite song genre? Oh gods, uhhhhhhhh probably alternative rock, contemporary rock or hard rock. Eurgh, I can't decide! XD

Favorite food? PIZZA! 

Do you still love cheese puffs? YES!

Favorite food? PIZZA!

replies.body:
Joe! It's been way too long! How have you been? :D

Opinions? Honestly, you were my favourite staff member and still are one of my favourite people on this server. You're a really nice guy who's not afraid to stick up for yourself and stand up to people when you think they're wrong, but you're also really laidback and know what to take seriously and what not to. You also have a great sense of humour. 

Negative things about you? You don't have Snapchat. Sad now. :( ;)
